text: Jeni pase kitabanum jnana hatum, tene kahyum ke tamarum palaka jhabakavata pahela ja hum tamari same tene lavi sakum chum, jyare sulaimane te sinhasanane potani samaksa joyum, to kaheva lagya, a ja mara palanaharani krpa che, jethi te mari kasoti kare ke hum abhari banum chum ke krtaghni. Abhari potana phayada mate ja abhara vyakta kare che ane je abhara vyakta na kare to maro palanahara (beparavaha) dhanavana ane udara che
